title: The Advenures of Charlie Perez: The Guide

story.text: Charlie Perez discovers he has the ability to foresee events clearly whenever he gives advice. He begins to use this power to help his neighbors with small decisions.
Charlie helps a local school prepare for a potential storm by advising them to cancel an outdoor event. His advice proves crucial as a surprise storm hits.
Charlie receives a vision of a bank robbery in progress while advising a friend on financial investments. He anonymously tips off the police, helping to prevent the heist.
Charlie's fame as a 'wise guide' starts to spread in the town. More residents seek out his counsel, hoping to gain insights about personal and community issues.
A doubtful man visits Charlie, testing if his abilities are genuine. Charlie advises him on a delicate family matter, which leads to a heartfelt reconciliation in the man's family.
Charlie receives a strong premonition about a fire in a nearby building. He immediately guides the occupants safely out before the fire escalates, saving several lives.
Charlie reflects on his week, realizing that his greatest ability isn't just foreseeing outcomes, but genuinely caring and engaging with the people he advises.

ending: As he looks out over his peaceful town, Charlie understands that true heroes are made not just by their powers, but by the love and care they extend to others.
moral: Wisdom and care for others can make anyone a hero.
